CustomField.description: Campo que almacena el importe de cuota mensual de la deuda del titular
CustomField.formula: IF( AV_InstallmentAmount1__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_InstallmentAmount1__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c)), 3) & "," & IF( MOD(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c, 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c, 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(AV_InstallmentAmount1__c, 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) & " " & AV_InstallmentCCY1__c
CustomField.label: Cuota mensual deuda titular
